The Second Tithe 

     The Lord desires the churches in every place to take hold more diligently of the church school work, giving liberally to sustain the teachers. The question has been asked, "Could not the second tithe be used for the support of the church school work?' It could be used for no better purpose.--Ms 67, 1901, p. 5. ("The Church School," July 29, 1901.)
